SEARCH
Module com.gang60
Package com.gang60

Interface MenuRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
JdbcMenuRepository
public interface MenuRepository
Defines the contract for repository operations involving menu items, their associated ingredients, and the join relationships between them.
See Also:
  • JdbcMenuRepository
  • MenuItemModel
  • IngredientModel
  • MenuItemIngredientLink

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    MenuItemIngredientLink
    addOrUpdateIngredientLink(int menuItemId, int ingredientId, BigDecimal amountRequired)
    Adds or updates a link between a menu item and an ingredient.

    Deletes a menu item from the data store by its unique ID.

  • Method Details

    • findAllWithIngredients

      List<MenuItemModel> findAllWithIngredients()
      Retrieves all menu items and their associated ingredients.
      Returns:
      a list of MenuItemModel objects, each containing zero or more MenuItemIngredientLink records

    • upsertMenuItem

      Integer upsertMenuItem(MenuItemModel item)
      Inserts a new menu item or updates an existing one.

      Implementations should check if MenuItemModel.getMenuItemId() is null; if so, they insert the record and return the generated ID. Otherwise, they update the existing record.

      Parameters:
      item - the MenuItemModel to insert or update
      Returns:
      the ID of the inserted or updated menu item

    • deleteMenuItem

      void deleteMenuItem(int menuItemId)
      Deletes a menu item from the data store by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      menuItemId - the ID of the menu item to delete

    • findOrCreateIngredientByName

      IngredientModel findOrCreateIngredientByName(String nameFull)
      Finds an ingredient by its name or creates it if not found.

      Matching should be case-insensitive.

      Parameters:
      nameFull - the full name of the ingredient to find or create
      Returns:
      an IngredientModel representing the existing or newly created ingredient

    • addOrUpdateIngredientLink

      MenuItemIngredientLink addOrUpdateIngredientLink(int menuItemId, int ingredientId, BigDecimal amountRequired)
      Adds or updates a link between a menu item and an ingredient.
      Parameters:
      menuItemId - the ID of the menu item
      ingredientId - the ID of the ingredient
      amountRequired - the required quantity of the ingredient
      Returns:
      a MenuItemIngredientLink representing the created or updated relationship

    • removeIngredientLink

      void removeIngredientLink(int menuItemIngredientId)
      Removes a link between a menu item and an ingredient by its unique link ID.
      Parameters:
      menuItemIngredientId - the ID of the link to delete
